questions.name: Field Completeness
questions.description: Proportion of mandatory schema fields populated including hierarchical structure and governance

questions.name: Entry Length Adequacy
questions.description: Narrative fields have meaningful content length
questions.evidence: description: Multicenter, multimodal, high-resolution clinical dataset developed by the CHoRU...

questions.name: Keyword Diversity
questions.description: Number of unique keywords provided

questions.name: File Enumeration and Type Variety
questions.description: Number of distribution formats and file type diversity

questions.name: Data File Size Availability
questions.description: Presence of file size or dimensional metadata (bytes, instance counts)

questions.name: Dataset Identification Metadata
questions.description: Presence of unique identifiers (DOI, RRID, URLs)

questions.name: Funding and Acknowledgements Completeness
questions.description: Funding sources, grants, sponsors, and creator affiliations

questions.name: Ethical and Privacy Declarations
questions.description: Comprehensive ethics: IRB, deidentification, privacy, consent, compensation, vulnerable populations

questions.name: Access Requirements and Governance Documentation
questions.description: Access policy, license, IP restrictions, regulatory restrictions, confidentiality level

questions.name: Interoperability and Standardization
questions.description: Standard formats, encoding, ontologies, schema conformance

questions.name: Tool and Software Transparency
questions.description: Preprocessing, cleaning, labeling strategies with software tools

questions.name: Collection Protocol Clarity
questions.description: Collection mechanisms, acquisition methods, data collectors, timeframes

questions.name: Version History Documentation
questions.description: Version info, version access, errata, update plans, release notes

questions.name: Associated Publications
questions.description: Citations or DOI-linked references

questions.name: Human Subject Representation
questions.description: Demographics, subpopulations, vulnerable population protections

questions.name: Findability (Persistent Links)
questions.description: Persistent identifiers (DOI, ID) and URLs for access

questions.name: Accessibility (Access Mechanism)
questions.description: Download URL, distribution formats, access policy

questions.name: Reusability (License and Use Guidance)
questions.description: License with explicit use guidance (intended/prohibited/discouraged)

questions.name: Data Integrity and Provenance
questions.description: Version access, errata, updates, source derivation, parent datasets

questions.name: Interlinking Across Platforms and Datasets
questions.description: External resources and dataset relationships (typed relationships, hierarchical linkages)
